description: Great for parties and for sharing. Grab the kids and make this recipe together.
name: Cheesy Pizza Bread Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top with remaining cheese and sprinkle with herbs and bake for 30 mins or until dip is warm and bread is toasted.
